content: TE-Y/S TP Tamping plates Ultra-robust tamping plate for compacting earth and gravel using SDS Max (TE-Y) or TE-S shanks ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Tamping plate only – to be used with a universal shank with a TE-Y or TE-S connection end Upgraded tamping power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the plate Better reliability – these tamping plates are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Multiple sizes available – helping you to match the chisel to the needs of the job Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Compacting dirt and sand For use with SDS Max (TE-Y) and TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers and a compatible shank (available separately) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S, TE-Y (SDS Max), TE-H17 (HEX 17) Application: Compacting Tamping plate dimensions (L x W): 200 mm x 200 mm Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S, TE-Y (SDS Max), TE-H17 (HEX 17) | Application | Compacting | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429830 - Tamper plate TE-Y/S TP 15x15 - Package Size 1 pc
